article_title: Finnish Startup Donut Lab Claims First Production-Ready Solid-State EV Battery at CES 2026

content_preview.title: Finnish Startup Donut Lab Claims First Production-Ready Solid-State EV Battery at CES 2026
content_preview.summary: Donut Lab unveils solid-state battery with 400 Wh/kg density and 5-minute charging, now shipping in Verge motorcycles.
content_preview.body_excerpt:
## Overview

Finnish battery startup Donut Lab announced at CES 2026 what it claims is the world's first production-ready all-solid-state battery for electric vehicles. The company says its technology is already being manufactured at gigawatt-hour scale and will ship in Verge Motorcycles starting Q1 2026, making it the first commercial EV to use solid-state battery technology.
